textSub.name: tagline
textSub.string: A starfish a day keeps low scores away!

textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: Rumor has it that some tough customers live on this side of \n the reef. Watch out for the Lion Fish who can chase you down! \n

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
STARFISH BUBBLES:
 Starfish bubbles don't help you grow, but
 they are worth a lot of points. Plus, they
 won't bite back!
